feed.title: Bloch-Elkouby Lab

entry.title: Bergin and Garfield’s Emerging Scholars Award

link.title: Bergin and Garfield’s Emerging Scholars Award

entry.content: Dr. Bloch-Elkouby was awarded the Bergin and Garfield Emerging Scholar Award by Society for Psychotherapy Research
entry.summary: Dr. Bloch-Elkouby was awarded the Bergin and Garfield Emerging Scholar Award by Society for Psychotherapy Research
